ygData.subject: RE: Pugius Dagger
ygData.msgSnippet: You were lucky then, I think I spent 80% of my last 13 levels there and saw it 3 times I think. Last time was this week-end and I managed to pull it, we got
ygData.messageBody:
You were lucky then, I think I spent 80% of my last 13 levels there and saw
it 3 times I think. Last time was this week-end and I managed to pull it, we
got gladius but I (as usual) didn't win the lottery. :)

PS: the fiend is found on the 1st floor, not the basement. (well, I didn't
actually see it spawn but that's where I found it and heard it was roaming)

Thormael


>From: David Knadler <dknadler@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: eqbards@onelist.com
>Subject: RE: [eqbards] Pugius Dagger
>Date: Fri, 15 Oct 1999 15:23:25 -0600
>
>Actually, Pugius is 5 DMG / 23 Delay (the Dragoon Dirk is 6/23). It can be
>gleened off the Lesser Blade Fiend in Unrest. Very, very rare spawn. I
>spent 3 or 4 levels there and only saw it twice.
>
>Desmei Sightblinder
>Lvl 30 Bard [Povar]
>
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Ben Wilson [mailto:ruldaas@...]
> > Sent: Friday, October 15, 1999 3:06 PM
> > To: eqbards@onelist.com
> > Subject: [eqbards] Pugius Dagger
> >
> >
> > From: "Ben Wilson" <ruldaas@...>
> >
> > I acquired a Pugius dagger quite some time ago from a
> > friendly bard for only
> > 25pp. It's stats are 6dam 23 delay magic peircing. Its
> > damage ratio is
> > just a little bit better than a Dragoon dirk but it doesn't
> > have any stat
> > increases. What I'm curious to know is where can this weapon
> > be found? It
> > looks just like a regular or a rusty dagger and mine is the
> > only one I've
> > ever seen. I forgot to ask the bard I got it from where he
> > got it...so any
> > help would be appreciated. I'm guessing that because it has the same
> > graphic as a regular or rusty many people overlook this fine weapon.
> >
> >
> >
> > Ruldaas Riverdance
